level.text: No person shall act as a matchmaker for an event without a matchmaker’s or promoter’s license issued pursuant to this chapter.
An applicant for a license as a matchmaker shall be employed by a promoter licensed under this chapter.

A matchmaker shall not match contestants in such a way that one of the contestants is far superior to the other, considering the experience, demonstrated ability, record, and reputation of the contestant, and the quality of the contestant’s opponents.
The Commission may take disciplinary action against a matchmaker if:
The matchmaker provides to the Commission false information concerning a contestant’s record.
